title: Houston dad has hope after charges filed in son's kidnapping
sentence: Chris Brann remembers the day his son Nico was kidnapped by his ex-wife Marcelle and taken to Brazil.
clause: son Nico was kidnapped by Marcelle and taken to Brazil

title: Houston dad has hope after charges filed in son's kidnapping

title: Lawyer files motion asking judge to throw out international kidnapping case
sentence: For now Carlos and Jemima Guimaraes remain out on bond as both parties wait to see what a judge will decide on this latest motion.

title: Defense spends hours grilling father of boy in international kidnapping case
sentence: The defense's strategy appears to be attempting to discredit the boy's father.

title: Trial begins for grandparents in high-profile international kidnapping case
sentence: Early Tuesday morning Carlos and Jemima Guimaraes arrived in court alongside their high profile legal team led by Rusty Hardin.

title: Trial begins for grandparents in high-profile international kidnapping case
sentence: Prosecutors painted a sinister picture of the grandparents and their plan to help take Nico and keep him in Brazil.

title: Timeline: A mother’s decision to kidnap her son
sentence: July 2015 — A Brazilian federal court rules Nico was illegally abducted, but refuses to return him to the U.S., citing Nico is acclimated to the environment in Brazil.

title: Timeline: A mother’s decision to kidnap her son
